name: Orbital Narrative
description:
Story:

    In the future where planets are being colonized by humanity.  A mysterious mining ship thought to be lost has returned and is not responding to any hails while it fixes itself in geostationary orbit.  You play as a robot that has been dispatched to go aboard the ship and shut off it's engines.  But several challenges await you aboard the mining vessel on the perilous task to turn off the ships reactors.

Gameplay Description:

    Orbital Narrative is a short semi-masocore 2D platformer that takes it's cues from old school NES games.  It's playtime is estimated at around 1 hour.  Orbital Narrative has two endings which may extend playtime.

Game Features:
  • 2D Platforming
  • 2 Endings
  • A high degree of difficulty
  • Original art and music
  • Level select map
